text: This is a list of Dutch television related events from 1974. ==Events== ==Debuts== ==Television shows== ===1950s=== *NOS Journaal (1956–present) *Pipo de Clown (1958-1980) ==Ending this year== ==Births== *1 February - Fabienne de Vries, TV presenter, actress & singer *3 June - Tooske Ragas, actress & TV presenter *23 July - Jan Joost van Gangelen, TV presenter & sports journalist *9 November - Bridget Maasland, dancer, TV presenter & model ==Deaths==
title: 1974 in Dutch television
